title: Ancient Artifact
story: In the small town of Limestone, a local museum curator, Charlotte Green, reported the mysterious disappearance of an ancient artifact with strange powers.
The artifact, known as the 'Stone of Shadows', was said to bring darkness upon whomever possessed it.
As more mysterious occurrences unfold in the town, the residents are left wondering about the origins and powers of the 'Stone of Shadows'.
prompt: An image of a small town museum with an ancient artifact missing.

suspect.name: Dr. Edward Monroe
suspect.alibi: Claimed to be out of town during the disappearance.
suspect.confirmation: Bought a one-way ticket before the incident.

witness.name: Claire Williams
witness.observation: Saw Dr. Monroe running out of the museum the night of the disappearance.

npcs.name: Officer Jack Thompson
npcs.dialogue: We must find the artifact before it's too late.

npcs.name: Professor Lisa Patel
npcs.dialogue: I've been researching ancient artifacts with dark powers, and this one is particularly dangerous.

clues.Rubble in garden: Traces of footprints leading away from the museum
clues.Note on desk: 'The stone has been taken back to where it belongs' - anonymous note
clues.Glowing rocks: Found near the museum at night
